org.sopra.api.command

Interface BuildPowerPlantCommand

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Command

    public interface BuildPowerPlantCommand
extends Command
    A command that builds a power plant at a given transformer station.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void execute()
      Build a power plant of selected type at a given transformer station.
      PlantLocation getTarget()
      Target plant location on which power plant is to be built.
      ProducerType getType() 

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        void execute()
      throws org.sopra.internal.game.command.CannotExecuteCommandException
        Build a power plant of selected type at a given transformer station. The command can only be executed once during build phase and is executed immediately.
        Throws:
        org.sopra.internal.game.command.CannotExecuteCommandException - - is thrown if at least one of following conditions is met:
        • Command was already executed.
        • Method is not called during build phase.
        • At target transformer station a power plant was already built.

      • getTarget

        PlantLocation getTarget()
        Target plant location on which power plant is to be built.
        Returns:
        The plant location.

      • getType

        ProducerType getType()
        Returns:
        Designated type of power plant to be built.
